description: DealHunter Application Dashboard v7 - Comprehensive monitoring with improved layout, better visualizations, and enhanced metrics. Focuses on business KPIs, performance, infrastructure health, and error analysis.

panels.title: ðŸ“Š System Overview - Key Performance Indicators

panels.description: Real-time rate of ads being discovered across all marketplaces. Higher values indicate healthy scraping activity.
panels.title: âš¡ Ads Discovery Rate

panels.description: Real-time rate of search tasks being executed. Should align closely with task creation rate.
panels.title: âš¡ Search Execution Rate

panels.description: Real-time rate of user matches being found. Low-frequency metric measured per hour.
panels.title: ðŸŽ¯ Matches Found Rate

panels.description: Real-time error rate across all operations. Lower is better.
panels.title: âŒ Error Rate

panels.description: Synchronization score between search execution and task creation rates. Values >85% indicate healthy sync.
panels.title: ðŸ”„ Search/Task Sync Score

panels.description: Overall system health based on cache hit rate, queue lengths, and error rates. >80% = healthy.
panels.title: ðŸ’š System Health
ðŸŽ¯ Core Business Metrics - Discovery & Execution Rates

panels.description: Real-time ads discovery rate per marketplace (ads/minute). Shows scraping activity and health.
panels.title: âš¡ Ads Discovery Rate by Marketplace (per minute)

panels.description: Real-time search execution rate per marketplace (searches/minute). Should correlate with task creation.
panels.title: âš¡ Search Execution Rate by Marketplace (per minute)

panels.description: Match discovery rate measured per hour (low-frequency event). Shows user value generation.
panels.title: ðŸŽ¯ Matches Found Rate by Marketplace (per hour)
âš™ï¸ Task Processing Health & Queue Management

panels.description: Comparison of task creation rate vs completion rate. Should be balanced for healthy processing.
panels.title: âš™ï¸ Task Creation vs Completion Rate (per minute)

panels.description: Current queue lengths by queue name. Lower values indicate efficient processing.
panels.title: ðŸ“‹ Task Queue Lengths by Type

panels.description: Task processing efficiency score based on completion vs creation rates. >95% is excellent.
panels.title: âš¡ Task Processing Efficiency by Type (%)

panels.description: Queue health score based on queue lengths. Lower queue lengths = higher health scores.
panels.title: âœ… Queue Health Score by Type (%)
âš¡ Performance Metrics - Search & Listing Duration Analysis

panels.description: Search duration percentiles by marketplace. P95 shows 95th percentile latency.
panels.title: âš¡ Search Duration Percentiles (p50, p95)

panels.description: Listing fetch duration percentiles by marketplace. Lower is better.
panels.title: âš¡ Listing Fetch Duration Percentiles (p50, p95)

panels.description: Performance health score based on p95 search durations. Target <30s (good), <60s (acceptable). Higher scores indicate faster marketplace responses.
panels.title: ðŸŽ¯ Performance Health Score by Marketplace (p95 <30s = good, <60s = acceptable)
ðŸ”§ Infrastructure Health - Redis Cache & Task Processing

panels.description: Redis cache hit rate by marketplace. Higher is better (>90% is excellent).
panels.title: ðŸ’¾ Redis Cache Hit Rate by Marketplace (%)

panels.description: Task completion rate per minute by task type. Shows worker throughput.
panels.title: âš¡ Task Completion Rate by Type (per minute)

panels.description: Redis cache hit rate trend over time. Shows cache effectiveness.
panels.title: ðŸ’¾ Redis Cache Hit Rate Trend Over Time (%)

panels.description: Total proxy requests over selected time window. Shows success (green) vs failure (red) counts by marketplace. Critical visual indicator of proxy health.
panels.title: ðŸ“Š Proxy Requests: Success (Green) vs Failure (Red) by Marketplace
âŒ Error Analysis & Marketplace Health

panels.description: Application error rate by marketplace (errors per minute). Lower is better.
panels.title: âŒ Application Error Rate by Marketplace (per minute)

panels.description: Top 10 error types by occurrence count over the selected time window.
panels.title: ðŸ” Top 10 Error Types (Last 6 Hours)

panels.description: Marketplace health score based on error rates, cache hit rates, and discovery rates. >80% is healthy.

targets.expr: clamp_max((avg by (marketplace) (dealhunter_redis_cache_hit_rate{job="dealhunter-prometheus-exporter",environment=~"$environment",marketplace!="global"}) * 0.4 + (1 - clamp_max(sum by (marketplace) (rate(dealhunter_application_errors_total{job="dealhunter-prometheus-exporter",environment=~"$environment",marketplace!="global"}[5m]) * 60) / 50, 1)) * 0.3 + clamp_max(sum by (marketplace) (rate(dealhunter_raw_ads_discovered_total{job="dealhunter-prometheus-exporter",environment=~"$environment"}[5m]) * 60) / 30, 1) * 0.3) * 100, 100)

panels.title: ðŸ¥ Marketplace Health Score (cache 40% + errors 30% + discovery 30%)

panels.description: Total ads discovered over the selected time window. Increases with longer time ranges.
panels.title: ðŸ“Š Total Ads (Time Window)

panels.description: Total searches executed over the selected time window.
panels.title: ðŸ“Š Total Searches (Time Window)

panels.description: Total matches found over the selected time window.
panels.title: ðŸ“Š Total Matches (Time Window)

panels.description: Total errors over the selected time window.
